name: ASUS Backup File
summary: An ABU1 file is a backup file created by ASUS Backup, an Android app used to backup and restore data on ASUS ZenFone devices. It contains a backup of data from the ZenFone device, such as contacts, SMS messages, call logs, pictures, videos, music files, documents, personal settings, apps, and app data.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
